Posts.Content: hi all hope you had the best xmas possible had hosp today had a drain fitted 18th dec because since my diep on 5th oct been getting a lot of fluid well starting xmas eve noticed a smell coming from drain bag today was told got infection and about a hour ago a nurse phoned and said they,ve got hold of my surgeon who wants me nil by mouth from midnight and in hosp in morning at 9 am as i might have to have my stomache washed out thought it was all going to good but it could be worse just a bit comcerned god bless you all xxx   caroline xx
Posts.Title: infection in tummy after diep

Posts.Content: thank you saxxy xx
Posts.Title: infection in tummy after diep

Posts.Content: went to the seaside yesterday with hubby,2 sons daughter-law and grandson we had such a nice day actually forgot about c for a while i did,nt do a lot just sat in deckchair watching as still sore from op and bit painful but was nice being normal but last night did,nt sleep good just keep thinking what if !! get my results 21st sept to see what treatment il need and how far its gone the consultant said at first diagnosis i,d need rads so no i,ve got this just hoping nothing else sorry to whinge as i see a lot of you are more poorly than me i,ve been ok most of the time but feel i could cry just wish i new what was going to happen xx
Posts.Title: had a good day now down

Posts.Content: hi bluetit   sorry so late replying had a busy day with family lol  im very pleased with my new boob i,ve got a small scar down the side of my boob under my arm pit and my flat tummy is good im a 40 dd and still the same the boob might need a little touch up in about 9 mths have to wait and see but normal bras are fine it took about 6wks to feel like i was getting back to normal don,t get me wrong i had a lot of tirdness i still get more tired than i used to but i look after my grandson doing the school run and things and was back doing this end of nov i don,t regret having it done hope this helps and feel free to ask anything   god bless caroline xx
Posts.Title: Anyone had a DIEP Flap reconstruction?

Posts.Content: hi just thought i,d let you know about my diep recon i had a mx and imediate recon on 5th oct 2012 i had the op on the friday and went home the following tues afternoon i was in theatre 8hrs when i woke was a bit uncomfortable but nothing major was allowed to sit in a chair on the sunday the breast healed fine but had a problem with a seroma in my tummy thats a fluid build up was going to the hosp every other day to have it drained than a week before xmas i had to have a drain put back then got a infection but everything healed and now i don,t have to see my plastic surgeon until nov 2013 this app will be for my nipple tattoo and check how the breast has settled i had times i thought maybe i should,nt of had it done but i can honestly say im really glad i did please feel free to ask me anything you want hope this has helped good luck and god bless  caroline xx
Posts.Title: Anyone had a DIEP Flap reconstruction?

Posts.Content: good news xxx
Posts.Title: Feeling upbeat today

Posts.Content: good luck for tomorrow let us no how you get on god bless xx
Posts.Title: Second time around? Results tomorrow

Posts.Content: been waiting all week for a appointment letter to see ong for results from mx it never came i,ve just phoned his secretary to be told the app was sent last week for 2.25pm today so i find out if i need anymore treatment fingers and toes crossed its good news hope everyone is doing ok today will post later results xxxxxx
Posts.Title: results after mx

Posts.Content: hi sue great news on shrinking im not good with words but just to say all the best and good luck tomorrow god bless xx   caroline xx
Posts.Title: its spread so scared

Posts.Content: hi shawshank  im having the same mx and reconstruction straight away im seeing the plastic surgeon today at 11.30 should be going in mon1st oct for op i told my hubby of 26yrs il be trading him in for a toyboy after op as il be a hotty babe after all the surgery lol xxx hope all goes well for you god bless  caroline xx
Posts.Title: results at last

Posts.Content: thank you for replys good news sort of swelling on brain is due to high blood pressure thats noww under control and been diagnosed type 1 diabetic so scare over my daughters gettin better once again thank you god bless caroline xx
Posts.Title: not really to do with my bc but so upset

Posts.Content: hi everyone hope your all staying strong i had a mx with immediate recon in oct 2012 had a few blips along the way but getting there now my daughter (24 yrs) got admitted to hosp last thurs with swelling on the brain im helping look after the children who are 2 and half and 7 months i feel like my family is cursed im waiting for son-in-law to drop the kids off again so he can go to hosp im more scared than when i got told about my cancer i,ve got my 6 mth check (first since surgery ) on 22nd march and now thinking i bet its back im usually positive but so sad and scared life is crap sometimes sorrry to rant but im keeping strong for the family andneeded to scream god bless  caroline  xx
Posts.Title: not really to do with my bc but so upset

Posts.Content: hi everyone hope todays not to bad a day for all of you i,ve been to the hosp to see the breast nurse and anisitest ( sorry for spelling ) everything going ahead for my mx and  diep flap reconstruction on fri 5th oct one minute i feel scared the next relived its getting done then il be cancer free please god xx
Posts.Title: all set for mx on fri

Posts.Content: hi everyone just to let you no i had my mx and reconstrucion last fri 5th and came home yesterday not feeling to bad all went well got to go back to hosp tomorrow to check on my bellybutton was very pleased with my care in there my family are been brilliant so just resting got to wait and see if i need rads but hopefully the worst is over xxx god bless everyone xxxx
Posts.Title: home after masectomy

Posts.Content: hi shawshank of course i don,t mind you asking i had diep flap and im doing good they put a binder all round your tummy to keep things still but mine had to come off as i had my bellybutton moved and it was rubbingon it so now got big granny knickers and was told by reconsruction nurse to get sports bras from asda,tesco somewhere like that also had to get my mate get me a bra extender [from debenhams] as due to swelling i needed more room i got mine done in broomfield hosp essex there very good there and so far so good its thinking about it thats hard but though im in some pain nothing like i imagined hope this has helped anything else just ask good luck god bless xxx
Posts.Title: home after masectomy

Posts.Content: hi shawshank of course i don,t mind you asking i had diep flap and im doing good they put a binder all round your tummy to keep things still but mine had to come off as i had my bellybutton moved and it was rubbingon it so now got big granny knickers and was told by reconsruction nurse to get sports bras from asda,tesco somewhere like that also had to get my mate get me a bra extender [from debenhams] as due to swelling i needed more room i got mine done in broomfield hosp essex there very good there and so far so good its thinking about it thats hard but though im in some pain nothing like i imagined hope this has helped anything else just ask good luck god bless xxx

Posts.Content: thank you saxxy xx

Posts.Content: sorry i posted this a bit garbled xx
Posts.Title: not sure were i should be

Posts.Content: hi dreamthief  nice of you to comment good to see your  doing what you,ve always done help others i,m no good with words thank god for people like you xx god bless  xx caroline
Posts.Title: not sure were i should be

Posts.Content: hi all im from the class of 2012 i pop back here on and off but never really say anything as im not good at expressing things well so i apolygise (sorry for spelling mistakes not very bright hi all im from the class 2012 i pop in from time to time but never really give advice as im no good with words im finding this hard i had high dcis 40mm lump and 3 more smaller ones had a masectomy no other treatment i got off light the past 5/6 months i,ve been having problems swallowing tickly feeling in throat ,ear ache on and off and lost a bit of weight i went to doctors as im going through my change and thought i,d mention my throat probs thought i had a ear infection she has sent me as a urgent referral to ent now im worried i only had dcis surely cancer can,t come back after this i had tyriod out in 2009 due to large lump sorry its so long im no good with words also my urgent appointment is 23rd june once again im sorry to go on just needed to let it out i,ve not told family don,t want to worry them again hope all you lovely people are doing well god bless carolinexx
Posts.Title: not sure were i should be

Posts.Content: thank you ron ron for your reply i don,t  want to worry family incase hopefully its nothing but i have this horrible gut feeling it is i was,nt like this with the breast cancer xx
Posts.Title: not sure were i should be

Posts.Content: hi mistymoley thank you for your reply i did have all my thyriod out xx
Posts.Title: not sure were i should be

Posts.Content: thank you for your replys i,ve got a onc appointment 22nd march il ask then god bless all xx
Posts.Title: i never saw results

Posts.Content: hi everyone just been reading some posts and people are saying they saw all there results i,ve never been given any copies of my results just got told by bcn and oncologist were would i go for these thank you god bless xxx
Posts.Title: i never saw results

Posts.Content: i,ve got my first 6mth check up since having mx last oct 2012 don,t know why i feel so nervous i had diep for 40mm lump they then found another 2 smaller cancers but no chemo or rads so got off light i keep thinking what if they missed something sorry to ramble just a bit scared i,ve been a bit short of breath the past 5/6 wks tight feeling in my chest but don,t no if to mention it incase they think im paraniod as just after xmas i had terrible back pain turned out to be arthritis so don,t want to be a pest oh well app 2.00pm will be off soon god bless to everyone on here xxx
Posts.Title: first 6mth check up

Posts.Content: i,ve got to have a scan as theres a lump on the edge of my recon its near to centre of chest sorry its hard to explain but it could be due to recon back on waiting game thank you for your replys god bless caroline xx
Posts.Title: first 6mth check up

Posts.Content: good luck pat hope its not to bad god bless xxx
Posts.Title: Docetaxol You B*****D !!!

Posts.Content: hi everyone hope all are feeling positive today if not big hugs xx im going into hosp next mon 1st oct for left side masectomy and imediate reconstruction just wondering if anyone on here has had this and can let me no how they got on my bc nurse has told me a bit and i,m seeing the plastic surgeon on thurs but would like to hear from people who have had it done won,t google it as they put scary stuff on there lol i no i got to stay in hosp a week as there taking from my stomache to make a boob just want to no about recovery as i want to be home as soon as possible thank you xxx

Posts.Title: large swelling around node incision

Posts.Content: 2 weeks ago i had my sentinel node removed as well as the lump in my breast my arm has felt a bit heavy and uncomfortable today just had a shower and theres a large swelling on the scar under my arm has anyone else had this xx
Posts.Title: large swelling around node incision

Posts.Content: i never knew any of this about paraben i,ve now made a list and will be buying some new things xx
Posts.Title: Parabens

Posts.Content: i.ve just gone on amazon to order some shea butter products but theres all different brands ands and im now really confused sorry im so thick im new to this i had a sentinel node biopsy and lump removal nearly 3 wks ago wanted to start rubbing something on scar i get my results wed i no i,ve got to have rads so want to be ready hopefully no more bad news xx
Posts.Title: Parabens

Posts.Content: i,ve been trying to post on here since fri night don,t no what i was doing wrong saw my ong on fri was told the mx i had on the 5th of oct has got rid of the cancer so no more treatment just 6mth check up and 5 yrs of them they found more cancers in the breast they removed but taking my btreast took it all away thank you all for your support good luck god bless to everyone xxxx
Posts.Title: good news

Posts.Content: thank you all for kind wishes xxx
Posts.Title: good news

Posts.Content: great to hear some have finished treatment and on a new road good luck xxx i,m going to make sure i enjoy everyday of life xx much love to all xxxxx
Posts.Title: new year onwards and upwards

Posts.Content: good luck and happiness to everyone for 2013 lets hope we all kick the c in the arse thank ou everyone on here for being my support i don,t often write om here as you can see not very good with words just wanted to say thank you god bless caroline xxxxxxx
Posts.Title: new year onwards and upwards

Posts.Content: well done crazy and congratulations how lovely xx
Posts.Title: new year onwards and upwards

Posts.Content: hi all hope everyone doing ok as for myself i feel so tearful and down today but feel i am letting the side down i had a mx and diep recon on 5th oct docs say im doing good so no reason for this what a wimp just want it all to do one and have a normal life again fed up of people having to help me and just not been me i,ve got tears running down my face while typing so sorry folks scream over xxxxx
Posts.Title: so fed up of it all

Posts.Content: thank you all so much for your kind words and input not so tearful now xx im always the strong one in our family don,t no what happened tomorrows another day god bless xxxx
